notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceived and designed the experiments: H.H.F.K. and D.P.B. Collected the plant material and performed the chemical experiments: E.J.S.P.d.L., G.M.A.D., N.M.D.C., E.V.C., F.M.A.d.S., and H.H.F.K. Performed the in vitro and in vivo experiments: R.G.A., T.A.d.A., V.R.S., and L.d.S.S. Analyzed the data: J.S.P.L., G.M.A.D., N.M.D.C., E.V.C., F.M.A.d.S., H.H.F.K., R.G.A., T.A.d.A., V.R.S., L.d.S.S., M.B.P.S., and D.P.B. Contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools: M.B.P.S., H.H.F.K., and D.P.B. Wrote the paper: H.H.F.K. and D.P.B.
